long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple controls for Jombly.

Extension button opens Jombly and plays.  If Jombly is open, it plays the next track.  When next track is playing a notification of song information pops up in the lower right corner.  Notification can be turned off in the options tab by right clicking on the extensions and selecting options.  You can also go to the settings -> extensions -> options to turn if off.  Notification is enabled by default.

v0.1.1 Extension button and title notification fixed.

https://github.com/glidehealth/jomblyextension
